title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.3 - Accelerated payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.3 - Accelerated payments

State Regulations

Amounts received where delays in payments by an
intermediary for covered services rendered to beneficiaries have caused
financial difficulties for the hospital, or where a hospital has incurred a
temporary delay in its bill processing beyond the provider's normal billing
cycle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
